amendment.description: Amendment sought to require public hospitals seeking to recoup the costs of emergency medical services rendered to illegal aliens to provide the INS with identifying information about such individuals who are over the age of 18 in order to obtain reimbursement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to require public hospitals which are seeking to recoup costs of emergency medical services rendered to illegal aliens to provide the INS with identifying information about the individual in order to obtain reimbursement, but only for individuals over the age of 18.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bryant (TN) amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 250 (Roll no. 73).
